t.t-value: (submenu.is_mega_menu and submenu.is_visible) or submenu.child_id.filtered(lambda menu: menu.is_visible)

li.t-attf-class: #{item_class or ''} #{submenu.is_mega_menu and 'position-static'} #{offcanvas_is_leftside and 'o_mega_menu_left'} #{is_accordion_nav and 'accordion accordion-flush' or 'dropdown'}

div.t-attf-class: o_mega_nav o_cc1 position-fixed top-0 #{offcanvas_is_leftside and 'start-0' or 'end-0'} invisible d-flex align-items-center w-100

button.class: btn nav-link oi oi-chevron-left ms-n2 px-2

t.link_class.f: nav-link list-group-item list-group-item-action border-0 rounded-0 px-4 text-wrap

t.t-value: { 'lang': lang.replace('_', '-'), 'data-website-id': website.id, 'data-edit_translations': '1' if edit_translations else None, 'data-main-object': repr(main_object) if main_object else None, 'data-seo-object': repr(seo_object) if seo_object else None, }

html_data.update({ 'data-editable': '1' if editable else None, 'data-translatable': '1' if translatable else None, 'data-view-xmlid': xmlid, 'data-viewid': viewid, 'data-default-lang-name': website.default_lang_id.name.split('/').pop() if translatable else None, 'data-lang-name': website.env['res.lang']._get_data(code=lang).name.split('/').pop() if translatable else None, })

t.t-if: not additional_title and main_object and 'name' in main_object
seo_object and 'website_meta_title' in seo_object and seo_object.sudo().website_meta_title

t.t-value: (main_object and 'website_indexed' in main_object and not main_object.sudo().website_indexed) or (website.domain and not website._is_indexable_url(request.httprequest.url_root)) or (pager and isinstance(pager, dict) and pager.get('page', {}).get('num', 1) != 1)
seo_object and 'website_meta_description' in seo_object and seo_object.sudo().website_meta_description or website_meta_description or website_meta.get('meta_description', '')
seo_object and 'website_meta_keywords' in seo_object and seo_object.sudo().website_meta_keywords or website_meta_keywords

t.t-if: website and website.cookies_bar and website.block_third_party_domains and not request.env['ir.http']._is_allowed_cookie('optional') and not editable and not translatable and not request.env.user.has_group('website.group_website_restricted_editor')

attribute.name: t-attf-class
attribute.add: #{'d-none o_snippet_invisible' if 'footer_visible' in main_object and not main_object.sudo().footer_visible else ''}

xpath.attribute: '1' if 'footer_visible' in main_object and not main_object.sudo().footer_visible else None

div.p:
We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems.
Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.
